oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A good many genealogical notes and portions of Bushman family history have been taken down (B II. 349, 359 rev., 360

1. 3895 and 3896.) From some of these materials, and from other sources, twelve genealogical diagrams (in oblong double folio) have been compiled, each giving all the known ancestors of one individual, frequently extending four, and sometimes five generations back. ||kabbo (and possibly also |han kass'o and |a!kunta) give names (|xam and other) and biographical details of their relations and some other people from their country. There are poignant notes relating how some of them died and their experiences with white people.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Genealogies
